extends java.lang.Object
    Calls Uploader to upload topology package, and Launcher to launch Scheduler.

      • commandLineConfigs

        protected static Config commandLineConfigs​(java.lang.String cluster,
                                           java.lang.String role,
                                           java.lang.String environ,
                                           java.lang.String submitUser,
                                           java.lang.Boolean dryRun,
                                           DryRunFormatType dryRunFormat,
                                           java.lang.Boolean verbose,
                                           java.lang.Boolean verboseGC)
        Load the config parameters from the command line
        Parameters:
        cluster - name of the cluster
        role - user role
        environ - user provided environment/tag
        submitUser - the submit user
        dryRun - run as dry run
        dryRunFormat - the dry run format
        verbose - enable verbose logging
        verboseGC - enable verbose JVM GC logging
        Returns:
        config the command line config
